alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Otero, western Kiowa, Crowley, and northwestern Bent Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Wild Horse Point to Olney Springs. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Damaging winds could extend well ahead of thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford, Fowler, Ordway, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City, Cheraw, Crowley, Haswell, Blue Lake and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
